title: Shifter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player each night.
- Shift any player's stats at night, increasing their Attack or Defense by up to five stages and decreasing the other by that many stages. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use both your abilities in the same night.
- You may use your second ability twice each night if one of the uses targets yourself.

desc:
Post 835
*To the left! Take it back now, y'all!*
